articles.title: Pixels and Their Neighbours: Finite Volume
articles.description: In this tutorial we take you on the journey from continuous equations to their discrete matrix representations using the finite volume method for the Direct Current (DC) resistivity problem.

articles.title: Phase and the Hilbert Transform
articles.description: Phase is a useful underlying property of the analytic trace model of seismic data that can be used as both an interpretation aid and a means to calibrate and check interpretations on a given seismic dataset.
